::WindRider::
Battera's response made him very happy. He looked at
Battera and said to her playfully, "Race ya!!" With
that he transformed to beast mode (a condor) and flew
down the hallway.
--- logomorph@... wrote:
> ::Battera::
> 
> She smiled, "OK, I'll join you out side."  She
> turned and looked down 
> the hallway nervousely.  SHe was hoping not to run
> into that 
> wolverine.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > ::WindRider::
> > "Hey listen" he said to Battera, "I think I'm
> going to
> > go outside and get some fresh air, and see what I
> can
> > see. You can join me if you like." He smiled at
> her,
> > hoping she would accept.
> 
> 
>
